title: Dick Barton: Special Agent
description: In the east end warehouse, Dick Barton, special agent and defender of the free world, is about to meet his mincer. Baron Scarface—brought up by wolves and educated at Eton—has him suspended over three tons of rotating sharpened steel. Includes: Dick Barton Special Agent and Dick Barton and the Curse of the Pharoah's Tomb.
author: Phil Willmott
